API Reference¶

fastai.dataset: Dataset

Dataset¶

dataset.BaseDataset([transform])
dataset.FilesDataset(fnames, transform, path)
dataset.FilesArrayDataset(fnames, y, …)
dataset.FilesIndexArrayDataset(fnames, y, …)
dataset.FilesNhotArrayDataset(fnames, y, …)
dataset.FilesIndexArrayRegressionDataset(…)
dataset.ArraysDataset(x, y, transform)
dataset.ArraysIndexDataset(x, y, transform)
dataset.ArraysNhotDataset(x, y, transform)
dataset.ModelData(path, trn_dl, val_dl[, …])
dataset.ImageData(path, datasets, bs, …)
dataset.ImageClassifierData(path, datasets, …)

core.SingleModel(model[, name])

Learner¶

learner.Learner(data, models[, opt_fn, …])

LM RNN¶

lm_rnn.RNN_Encoder(ntoken, emb_sz, nhid, …) A custom RNN encoder network that uses - an embedding matrix to encode input, - a stack of LSTM layers to drive the network, and - variational dropouts in the embedding and LSTM layers
lm_rnn.MultiBatchRNN(bptt, max_seq, *args, …)
lm_rnn.LinearDecoder(n_out, nhid, dropout[, …])
lm_rnn.LinearBlock(ni, nf, drop)
lm_rnn.PoolingLinearClassifier(layers, drops)
lm_rnn.SequentialRNN(*args)

Model¶

model.Stepper(m, opt, crit[, clip, reg_fn])

nlp.ConcatTextDatasetFromDataFrames(df, …)
nlp.LanguageModelData(path, field, trn_ds, …) This class provides the entry point for dealing with supported NLP tasks.

Plots¶

plots.ImageModelResults(ds, log_preds) Visualize the results of an image model

RNN_Reg¶

rnn_reg.LockedDropout([p])
rnn_reg.WeightDrop(module, dropout[, weights]) A custom torch layer that serves as a wrapper on another torch layer.
rnn_reg.EmbeddingDropout(embed) Applies dropout in the embedding layer by zeroing out some elements of the embedding vector.

Text¶

transforms.Denormalize(m, s)
transforms.Normalize(m, s) Normalizes an image.
transforms.RandomRotateZoom(deg, zoom, stretch)
transforms.TfmType Type of transformation.
transforms.Transform([tfm_y]) A class that represents a transform.
transforms.CoordTransform([tfm_y]) A class that represents a coordinate transform.
transforms.AddPadding(pad[, mode, tfm_y])
transforms.CenterCrop(sz[, tfm_y]) A class that represents a Center Crop.
transforms.RandomCrop(targ[, tfm_y]) A class that represents a Random Crop transformation.
transforms.NoCrop(sz[, tfm_y]) A transformation that resize to a square image without cropping.
transforms.Scale(sz[, tfm_y]) A transformation that scales the min size to sz.
transforms.RandomScale(sz, max_zoom[, p, tfm_y]) Scales an image so that the min size is a random number between [sz, sz*max_zoom]
transforms.RandomRotate(deg[, p, mode, tfm_y]) Rotates images and (optionally) target y.
transforms.RandomDihedral([tfm_y])
transforms.RandomFlip([tfm_y])
transforms.RandomLighting(b, c[, tfm_y])
transforms.RandomBlur([blur_strengths, …]) Adds a gaussian blur to the image at chance.
transforms.CropType Type of image cropping.
transforms.Transforms(sz, tfms, normalizer, …)
